decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The facing materials used in the development to which this permission relates shall match those of the existing building(s) unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Prior to beneficial occupation of the development to which this permission relates, any windows inserted at first floor level and above in the western elevation shall be constructed so that no part of the framework less than 1.7m above finished floor level shall be openable. Any part below that level shall be fitted with and permanently retained in obscure glazing to a minimum of level 3 on the standard scale. Any film used to achieve the requisite obscurity level shall be non-perishable, tamper-proof, and shall be replaced immediately in the event that it ceases to result in obscurity to level 3.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The development must be carried out in accordance with the provisions of the Tree Report prepared by John Cromar's Arboricultural Company LTD submitted 07.03.2024 unless otherwise approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. Reason: To ensure that trees that are important to the character of the area or covered by TPOs are not adversely affected in accordance with Policy G7 of the London Plan 2021 and Policy DM10 of the Council's Core Strategy 2012.
description: Erection of single storey rear extension, first floor side extension and roof extension with rear dormer roof extensions and installation of 4nos. rooflights to facilitate loft conversion. Changes to side fenestrations.
